snippet: A new home-exchange website lets you inhabit magazine-perfect residences, but only if you qualify.
abstract: Behomm, home-exchange website created by graphic designers Eva Calduch and Agust Juste, allows fellow designers and artists with beautifully decorated luxury homes to trade places; site has about 1,200 members, with about 10 to 20 percent of applications being rejected for homes that do not quite measure up.
lead_paragraph: A new home-exchange website lets you inhabit magazine-perfect residences, but only if you qualify.
